snippet.title: Cat Guardian - the very first TRAILER #gaming #indiegame
snippet.description:
Here is the first trailer of our independent game Cat Guardian. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3027710/_/

It is a free-form tower defense card game that integrates resource management, construction, unit development, strategic deployment, and survival time challenges. 

Your main task is to gather resources daily and use them to build various combat cards to protect the Tree of Hope from zombie attacks at night. 
Whether the cats of Meowks Planet can fulfill their mission of defending the Tree of Hope and survive on a zombie-infested continent is up to you!

So excited to release our first video to the world (*^▽^*) A big Welcome to all of our players^^
